templates.name: How do I store essential oils?
templates.content:
Our Certified Aromatherapists recommend storing your essential oils in a dark place away from direct sunlight. We recommend storing them at no warmer than room temperature (72 degrees Fahrenheit). It is also essential that the lids are tightly shut. Keep in mind that most of our oils have a shelf life of 18 months or more! 

We also have some Storage Boxes on our website that are a great accessory in storing your essential oils: https://simplyearth.com/products/wooden-essential-oil-box-fits-36

templates.name: Whatâ€™s the difference between your oils and the big brands out there?
templates.content:
We pride ourselves on having the purest oils on earth. Our oils will either meet or exceed the big brand's quality. We source our pure oils directly and ethically from small farms in small batches, bottle them at our facility in Hingham, WI, and then sell the oils directly to you with no middle man. That's why we're able to charge so much less than a lot of other big essential oil companies, while still delivering stellar quality.

We are a family-owned business that is passionate about helping our customers create a toxin-free home. We are also a socially conscious brand, striving to be world changers by sourcing our oils ethically and by giving 13% of our profits to help end human trafficking.

templates.name: Is your Witch Hazel just a water and Witch Hazel extract? How is it extracted?
templates.content:
The Witch hazel extract is a clear liquid distilled from the twigs and bark of the witch hazel tree (Hamamelis virginiana), and the certified organic witch hazel extract we offer is collected and distilled domestically.

Witch Hazel Distillate, sometimes also called "Witch Hazel Distillate Water" and "Witch Hazel Extract," is extracted from the bark and leaves of the Hamamelis virginiana botanical, better known as the Witch Hazel shrub.

templates.name: How do I cancel my subscription?
templates.content:
For security purposes, we are unable to cancel subscriptions for our customers.

Nothing to worry about! It can be canceled through your online account. To proceed with the cancellation, kindly log in to your account at https://simplyearth.attn.tv/sl/0HePiHkh and follow these steps: https://simplyearth.attn.tv/sl/C2d_l6YC

1. From your Account, Click on "Manage My Subscription"
2. A pop-up will show. Please click on "Disable Subscription Autorenewal"
3. Next, you will be given the option to PAUSE for a few months as an alternative. If you want to proceed, click on "Disable my box autorenewal".
4. Then, you may also be asked for the reason for your cancellation, you will be free to choose which one among the options and click on "Disable my box Auto-Renewal" to finalize it.
5. Once successful, you will be prompted with a message, confirming that your subscription has been canceled.

Please take note that canceling the subscription will only stop the box for that month if done at least a day before the actual shipping date. Always remember that you can always reactivate your subscription by clicking the "Resume Box" Button on your Simply Earth Account.

templates.name: Do my billing and shipping address have to match? Can you go around it?
templates.content:
For security purposes, our system is designed so that for orders using card transactions, the billing address and shipping address should match in order for the payment to go through. This is to ensure that no fraudulent activities are happening, and that the sale is valid.

If in case the addresses do not match for personal reasons, you may use a verified PayPal as a payment method instead.
